data.title: Zip Code of Bhaktapur
data.meta_description: Postal Code / ZIP code / PIN Code of bhaktapur is 44800. ZIP code of Nepal is 00977. List of Postal code in Nepal.
data.text:
Zip Code, Postal code, Postcode, and PIN code all are the same. The ZIP code of Bhaktapur is 44800. Here the First digit is Pradesh, the second digit refers to District and the remaining three-digit represent the Post Office Code. The Postal Code of Nepal is 5 digits. Each digit has its own meaning. The zip code of Nepal is 00977

District Post Office Postal/Pin Code Post Office Type Bhaktapur Bhaktapur 44800 D.P.O. Bhaktapur Dubakot 44802 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Kharipati 44804 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Kharipati 44804 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Tathali 44805 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Jorpati 44806 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Gamcha 44809 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Gamcha 44809 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Dibyashwori 44810 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Thimi 44811 A.P.O. Bhaktapur Nagarkot 44812 A.P.O.

Postal code of other location of Nepal

The list of the Postal code below is in ascending order of the district name.

What is ZIP code? Where it is used?

The full form of ZIP is Zone Improvement Plan. Similarly, PIN refers to Postal Index Number. It is combinations of letters, digits, spaces, or even punctuation. Simply, it is a specific character given to any area. When we have to receive or send any documents globally or locally, a Postal code is used. If we apply for Google Adsense, the postal code of our location is required. When we fill-up the form for a bank account, a Postal code is asked.
